sentences.english: All the others refused on the grounds that they had to respect the privacy of their donors.
sentences.chinese: 其他的都以他們要尊重捐資人的隱私爲由拒絕了。

sentences.english: The achievement of Huizhou scholar was another rich fruits.
sentences.chinese: 衆多徽州文人所獲的功名，則是捐資興教的又一碩果。

sentences.english: The state shall encourage individuals and all segments of society to make donations to help develop education.
sentences.chinese: 國家鼓勵各種社會力量以及個人自願捐資助學。
